title: Software Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Language Proficiency Improvement Through Technology-Enhanced Skill-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Within six months, learners can comprehend and summarize intermediate-level professional texts in a target language (e.g., English/Korean).
Learners can systematically record and manage competency evidence in digital portfolios to visually represent over 80% of their learning growth.
Learners can enhance communication skills by exchanging feedback with peers using online collaboration tools at least twice weekly.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
